wikipedia_page.main: Brigadier Ernest Frank Benjamin (Hebrew: לוי בנימין‎, Levi Binyamin)  (5 February 1900 – 14 March 1969) was a Canadian-born British Jewish officer who commanded the British Army's Jewish Brigade during the Second World War.

response: From the Palestine Regiment, two platoons, one Jewish, under the command of Brigadier Ernest Benjamin, and another Arab were sent to join Allied forces on the Italian Front, having taken part in the final offensive there.
